name: Spring Has Sprung
description:
Who doesn't love Spring anytime of the year? Brimming with new life and bursting with vibrant colours of the season. Brand new baby birds, crisp juicy apples and flowers galore....

As a Greeting Card or a Party Invitation, this unique 3D Tree card with a wee little swing, will always look stylish on a present or set the theme for the next Birthday. All sides have different images with one side blank to write your message. You can make all your party invitations for a fraction of the price of pre-purchased cards. Ready to print time and again

To compliment the theme I've included fun party favours and 4 kinds of cute gift tags in the shape of trees

W H A T ' S • I N C L U D E D ?
Instructions
3D Tree template (each side has a different image)
Cutting Guide template
Party Favour template
Envelope template
Gift Tags template

S P E C I F I C A T I O N S •
3D card • 5" x 3.5" (130mm x 90mm)
Party Favour • 4.75" x 3.25" (120mm x 85mm)
Envelope • A2 size. This size is readily available at most stationery retailers
Tags • 2.25 x 1.5" (60mm x 42mm)

PDF suits US Letter and A4 formats. When purchased, I'll send the pdf file within 24 hours and you're ready to go

name: Home Sweet Home
description:
Printable pdf's......do-it-yourself....simply print, cut, fold and glue....too easy!

How touching is it to receive a lovely handmade card or invitation? Especially in the shape of the sweetest house with windows and doors that open and close and a welcome mat to boot! Roses and Tulips flourish in a forest green garden with brilliant white clouds hovering overhead

As a Greeting Card, House Warming Card or Party Invitation, this unique 3D House card will always look so stylish! Or use as inspiration to set the theme for the next Birthday Party no matter what the age. All sides have different images with one side blank to write your message. You can make all your party invitations for a fraction of the price of pre-purchased cards. Ready to print time and again

To compliment the theme I've included fun House party favours with cute cloud handles and 2 kinds of house gift tags

1 1 • P A G E • P D F • I N C L U D E S :
Photographic Instructions
3D House template (each side has a different image)
2 Party Favour templates
Envelope template
2 Gift Tag templates

S P E C I F I C A T I O N S •
3D card • 5" x 3.5" (130mm x 90mm)
Party Favour • 4.75" x 3.25" (120mm x 85mm)
Envelope • A2 size. This size is readily available at most stationery retailers
Tags • 2.25 x 1.5" (60mm x 42mm)

PDF suits US Letter and A4 formats. When purchased, I'll send the pdf file within 24 hours and you're ready to go

name: Sassy Handbag
description:
Printable pdf's......do-it-yourself....simply print, cut, fold and glue....too easy!

Every girl needs some Sassiness in her life. Add glamour to any event with this ever-so-girlie handbag (or is it a clutch?)

As a Greeting Card or an Invitation for a Birthday, Kitchen Tea or any occasion when the girls get together, this unique 3D handbag card will always look chic. And what purse is not complete without mandatory lipstick, nail polish, compact and sunglasses?

To make life easier (and we all like that!) it's editable so you can type your own details on the bag insert. You can make all your cards and accessories for a fraction of the price of store-bought cards. Ready to print time and again

W H A T ' S • I N C L U D E D ?
Instructions
3D Bag template (to fit standard A2 envelope)
Editable insert to customize your details
Notepaper (not pictured)
Party Favour with handle template
Envelope template (not pictured)
Gift Tags template (not pictured)

S P E C I F I C A T I O N S •
3D card • 4" x 5.5" (100mm x 140mm)
Party Favour • 4" x 5" (90mm x 120mm)
Envelope • A2 size. This size is readily available at most stationery retailers
Tags • 2.25 x 1.5" (60mm x 42mm)

PDF suits Letter and A4 formats. When purchased, I'll send the pdf file within 24 hours and you're ready to go

name: Special Delivery
description:
Printable pdf's......Do-it-yourself....simply print, cut, fold and glue....too easy!

Want a distinctive way to package that special gift or product? Fabulous to house pretty handmade cookies, sweets, jewelry or any other little offerings

Designed by me, this sweet vintage inspired box and gift card is the ultimate in handmade gift-giving. It's so easy to print and make your very own boxes and cards time and again. There's no limit...

Perfect for Valentine's Day, Wedding favours, Birthdays or simply for a great friend or acquaintance. The images are sourced from antique love letters and a bit of Shakespeare thrown in for good measure

The two bird halves on top act as an interlocking tab. They slide onto each other and to form an elegant dove

If you have your own beautiful card, simply use the box template as a guide for trimming the box into shape

*************For cookie recipe, visit my blog. Copy and paste this link into your browser:
http://cateholst.typepad.com/aworkinprogress/2009/01/buttery-vanilla-cookies-with-lemon-icing-recipe.html

W H A T ' S • I N C L U D E D ?
Instructions
Box template
Cutting Guide template
Card template
Envelope template

S P E C I F I C A T I O N S •
Box • 2.25" x 2.25" (57mm x 57mm) plus the height of the dove section
Card • 5.5" x 4.5" (140mm x 115mm)
Envelope • A2 size. This size is readily available at most stationery retailers

PDF suits Letter and A4 formats. When purchased, I'll send the pdf file within 24 hours and you're ready to go

name: Special Delivery Pillow Box and Accessories
description:
Do-it-yourself....simply print, cut, fold and glue....too easy!

Don't you just love yesteryear? I've hunted high and low for some truely beautiful love-letters from early last century. Then carefully reproduced parts on these vintage inspired pillow boxes, dove tags and greeting card with envelope

The pillow boxes are fabulous to house pretty handmade cookies, sweets, jewelry or any other little offerings. Perfect for Valentine's Day, Wedding favours, Birthdays or simply for a great friend or acquaintance. In two sizes, the larger is ideal for, say, a necklace and smaller for earrings

While not essential, I've used a wax and seal to lend more olde worlde charm or simply punch a small hole in the wing and attach with red ribbon or twine

If you already have your own beautiful heavy weight card, simply use the Cutting and Trimming Guides in the pdf to assist your box-making

W H A T ' S • I N C L U D E D ?
Instructions
Large Pillowbox template
Small Pillowbox template
Cutting and Trimming Guide templates for both sizes
2 types of dove tags
Card template
Envelope template

S P E C I F I C A T I O N S •
Large Pillow box template (made-up) • 4.5" x 3" (120mm x 80mm)
Small Pillow box template (made-up)
Card • 3.25" x 2" (85mm x 50mm)
Envelope • A2 size. This size is readily available at most stationery retailers

PDF suits US Letter and A4 formats. When purchased, I'll send the pdf file within 24 hours and you're ready to go
